comments.content:
It must be **[Linotype Zapfino Three](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025130/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=LTZapfino%20Three%20-%20Regular&fid=51b94b8cf1c732b28dd3d7c33f856352&fsize=60&text=Achard%20-Vincent&fit=1)** combined with the capital /A & /V of **[Linotype Zapfino Two](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025130/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=LTZapfino%20Two%20-%20Regular&fid=e8d2dc8e571ff67648b4fc35d4b1cf81&fsize=60&text=Achard%20-Vincent&fit=1)**  
/V looks also somewhat deformed...
